events.name: onInitialized
events.description: This event is fired after the framework is initialized. Controls and Symbols are not yet initialized at this time.

events.name: onLocaleChanged
events.description: This event is fired after a (perhaps new) locale has been loaded.

events.name: onThemeDataChanged
events.description: This event is fired after the theme json and all css files have been loaded at a theme change. It is additionally fired when a new font-face file has been fetched.

events.name: onUserChanged
events.description: This event is fired, if a new user is logged in.

events.name: onUserDataChanged
events.description: This event is fired, if a new user is logged in or the user configuration (group membership, timezone...) of the logged in user has changed.

events.name: onUserInGroupChanged
events.description: This event is fired after a user is known to be in different usergroups or no authentification is required.

events.name: onConfigChanged
events.description: This event is fired when the tchmiconfig.json has changed. This file can only change while engineering.
